author: Erica Gonzales
title: Angelina Jolie Says Brad Pitt Will "Always" Be a Part of the Family
text:
Five months after announcing their divorce , Angelina Jolie assures that Brad Pitt is still, and "will always be" a part of the family. Although she's kept fairly quiet in the wake of her highly-publicized split, the actress-turned-director is starting to open up. In her initial divorce statement from September, Jolie said, "This decision was made for the health of the family." Today on Good Morning America, the star revealed how the Jolie-Pitt clan is holding up.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "We are focusing on the health of our family," she said after a heavy sigh. "And so we will be. We will be stronger when we come out of this, because that's what we're determined to do as a family."
When asked if she still believes Pitt is "a wonderful father" and "part of the family," she responded: "Of course. Of course. We will always be a family. Always."
